reviews.review:
Vamos a ver, hago esta valoración para no ir comentario por comentario diciendo lo mismo, dejar claro que llevo casi 1000 horas y no hablo bajo el desconocimiento o rage como hacen algunos y mucho menos soy un fanboy que defiende lo indefendible.

1º Se han dado casos donde la gente a perdido su progreso (a mi nunca me pasó) y leo por los análisis que si los devs se tocan la polla, que si es una mierda y no pierdas tu tiempo etc... 

Como digo A VECES a pasado pero no es un fallo común y aunque pase los propios devs han puesto a nuestra disposición los requisitos que piden para demostrar que es verdad (tu Steam ID y poco más) para darte millones de sangre con lo que te da para subir todo al max. 

Con lo cual todos esos análisis están equivocados/mal informados o simplemente ni se han molestado en mirar y han soltado bilis.

2º Sobre los bugs, sinceramente quitando algún problema en el lobby a la hora de entrar a jugar no he visto ninguno tocho/importante, me pongo a pensar y actualmente no tiene casi nada, tal vez haya alguno que no conozca pero no jode la experiencia de juego ni de lejos.

3º Sobre el juego en sí, se a convertido en mi juego favorito con casi 1000 horas y las que me quedan, es un juego que al inicio te cagas por las patas por el sonido, asesinos,  entorno y que luego dejas ese "miedo" de lado y pasa a ser otro juego mucho mejor y más divertido.

Antiguamente habia que echarle muchas horas para farmear blood pero ahora con las ofrendas, más el perk de David King y los cambios en diarias y santuario se hace mucho más ameno y más fácil.

Dicho esto, si te gusta el genero este es tu juego, el mejor bajo mi punto de vista y diria que he probado todos.

You remember hide and seek as a kid?
Well, this is the same.
Only with a killer that wants to hang you on a meat hook.

I really like this game. It is hard to escape a good killer. And it is even harder to defeat a group of 4 good survivors. It can be very hard to find survivors and if you let 4 live for a long time, they will turn on generators very quickly. 
  It is not neccesarily 'scary', although it is to some. Nerve-wracking is a much better word to describe it. 
  For some people it is scary, for others it is very scary. But for some, there is a conscious realization that it is a game. 
 However, that does not stop people who don't get scared from going "Oh no, oh no oh no. He's going to catch me, I'm screwed.' 
   All in all it is difficult as a survivor and a killer. 
 The less survivors, the easier it is for the killer.
 The more survivors, the harder it is for the killer. 
     It is a decently balanced game but there are glitches. 
  One guy I was playing with would jump through the window. And then every time I walked around the building to catch him on the other side, he would jump through the same window. From my perspective as the killer it was VERY highly annoying. 
  7/10.

No reddit 4chan review here sorry. The game is a lot of fun I find it more fun to try to survive than hunt just scarier IMO. It seems like some of the survivors are more favored for their abilities and what not so thats sort of lame, but I don't worry to much about it as I just find it fun running for my life and playing the game in such a way. The hunters are pretty cool too with my favorite being the hillbilly the chainsaw is scary. The other two both have unique qualities to them as well. My only complaint really is the lack of party making. I would be nice to be able to group with 1-2 more friends and play together rather than do it in a private party 1v1. That being said they are working on that which is awesome. Hope that was helpful.

Great game. A combination of pacing, ambient sound effects, exemplary horror timing and wonderful settings keeps me enjoying this game with friends. No matter how long you've played it, once the heartbeat kicks in you're immediately scared. So much fun in a relatively simplistic idea. Repair generators while avoiding the monster. Escape before it kills you. Because, "Death is not an escape".
If you're looking for great frustation, a toxic player base, glitches up the ass, and braindead developers, this game might be for you.

Wenn ihr kein Außenseiter seid der überhaupt Freunde hat und gegebenfalls auch mit den besagten Freunden spielen möchte ( IN EINER GEMEINSAMEN LOBBY ). Dann ist dieses Spiel höchstwahrscheinlich nichts für euch. Es ist sehr frustrierend dauerhaft eine Lobby suchen zu müssen um durch einen glücklichen Zufall in der gleichen Lobby zu landen wie die besagten Freunde. Es gibt aber für Leute die das mit mehreren Freunden spielen wollen glücklicherweise die Möglichkeit eine eigene Lobby zu erstellen.. leider können da dann aber keine Fremde joinen, lohnt sich also nicht wirklich nur zu 2.
Spiel wäre abgesehen von einigen, meiner Meinung nach, Balanceproblemen sehr gut wenn dieses Problem nicht wäre.
played with friends, screamed like a bitch, got told off for being loud 10/10 would play again

Sometimes you wait over 10 minutes for a match... then when you get in survivors dont even focus on getting gens aaaand just give up on first hook.

If this game is crossplay, why does it take this long to get into a match???

Joa leute :D das ist schon ein hammer Spiel.
Gruselfaktor gleich 10.
Buff survivals please :( :( :(

It's a fantastic game, buuuut. . . it needs some better matchmaking. I have heard and witnessed countless times of people who are new or beginners to the game being thrown against people who are already pros at the game. It makes it unfair twards those who are low level and don't have the hang of things yet. Otherwise it is an exelent game all around.

Hmmm. Let's start

Good game idea .. i mean no one has come to an idea like this in a game ... but the movies are full of it !

My experience in 1 hr : I have fun playng as a monster   but the  normal people are nice as well i  want to see in future a a little fight back  i mean.. bite the criminal  kick it the nuts something like that new maps   Crystal lake will be nice  (DLC whit jason and more) The idea is  this game will be booring if u play  alone  in my opinion if you have friends who like to be murdered buy it for them :)). I  can tell you BUY THIS GAME  but i can't because  is early alpha needs  alot of  remake because of the bugs  so if you want to have an good experience buy it but if you looking for a complete game is not your game.

PRO 
-3 Monster's this  thing is the best  because you will not get boored playng just 1 
-The customization and perks system are great i think it will be more in the future ..
-Horror movie based 
-The music  and suspans is good
-Good graphics
-Good optimizations 

Negative
-Bugged  monsters 
-Bugged animations
-The monster is relative slow but.. i am 50/50 here the humans need an advantage anyway




For now this is all i can tell you   i will come whit more info after i get new patches!


EDIT:After alot of time i came back the game is the same only better on the bugs side. Same old story  nothing new to gameplay  so i will change my vote to Negative for that.

It was good. Then they ruined the balance of the game.

Don't get me wrong the Survivors needed to be nerfed in someone way to make the game a little more fair. But when you change the balance of the game you don't super buff the killer, nerf all of the servivor perks, nerf the survivor movement.

There was a problem with survivors DCing from games. So they made it so the Killer gets rewarded if a survivor leaves. The other survivors on the team? No they derank when one of their ally leaves and they inevitably lose.

Did I mention I'm a rank 2 survivor? Yeah I constantly get ranked with rank 20 survivors. I don't think I've seen another Rank 1. Oh wait I have and the killer can see the survivor ranks but the survivors can't see what the killers rank is. So the killer just leaves the lobby if he sees to many high ranked survivors.

Basically a game starts then my rank 20 allies are dead in 2 minutes. I have 3 generators left to fix solo and on a rare grace of god occasion I find the trap door. Even if I  babysit my rank 20 allies to the end of the game eventually i'm going to get caught because I can't do everything and survivor nerfs mean you can't escape. Then the killer just sits and stares at me on the hook until I'm dead giving my allies no opportunity to save me.

If I was playing with people my own rank I wouldn't mind the nerfs because at least as a team we could overcome but the discordant noob teams literally just ruin the game and throw an even bigger nerf to survivors. Not being able to communicate is the biggest random nerf of all that they don't even consider when balancing.

Buy it if you wan't to play killer and wreck everyone. Don't buy it if you wan't to play survivor it's just a head ache now.

Dead by Daylight ein einfaches aber sehr geniales Game in dem viele Generes vertreten sind.
Grundprinzip des Spiels aus den Survivor welche 4 oder 5 Generatoren reparieren müssen (je nach Spieleranzahl) um die Ausgangstore mit Energie zu versorgen und somit dem grausamen Killer der die Survivor Jagd zu entkommen.
Persöhnlich kann ich einen Kauf dieses Spieles auf jedenfall empfehlen, denn es macht einen heiden Spaß als Killer sowie auch vorallem als Survivor, da es als Survivor erst recht Spaß macht den Killer an der Nase herumzuführen!
Das Spiel wird regelmäßig mit Updates gefüllt wobei hier aber auch ein Kritikpunkt liegt da die Entwickler recht langsam damit sind. Aber die Ideen sind da, da auch neue Killer und neue Maps kommen werden.
11/10 für Dead by Daylight das Spiel hat es mir angetan und vllt der jenige der das grad ließt auch? ;)

Only managed to play for about an hour before i had enough.

Despite being a [u]fully released game [/u] it does certainly not feel like it.
During my first hour i encountered multiple wall glitches with my character getting stuck in walls, unable to do anything, aswell as teleporting across small distances. (like having very high ping)
Weak response from player actions ingame (buttons not being activated when pushed)

Personaly i cannot recommend this game by its current state.

Whenever I see someone playing this game it reminds me of the time I peed on an electrical outlet...  The second my heart stopped there was so much bliss and there are definitely heart stopping moments in the game.  An amazing thriller of a game.  When the majority of the community was active they were constantly updating, when the majority of the community went dormant they are constantly updating.  With a title that plays the way this one does you would expect the developers/publishers to stop updating but they've done the opposite, constantly revamping the design of the game.
Ein wirklich gutes Spiel
:D

很不错的游戏，就是用外挂的太多，污染了公平的游戏环境。希望制作公司尽快修复这样的漏洞，那样这款游戏就完美了。
再有就是要严厉处罚用外挂软件的玩家，带给大家一个公平的游戏环境。
very good game. its so much fun!

Das Spiel ist durchaus echt geil und macht mega Laune, allerdings ist es echt beschissen das man mit seinen Freundn nicht gemeinsam online zocken kann. Auch wenn es "Töte deine Freunde" gibt, das ist aber irgendwie schwachsinn wenn nur 2 Leute das Spiel spielen (1 Kilelr und 1 Überlebender)...Da sollte man etwas ändern!!!


EDIT #2:
Nach einigen Monaten, wenn nicht sogar Jahre Pause habe ich mich nochmal an das Spiel gewagt und gehofft das es ein besseres Balancing bekommen hat und was soll ich sagen; es ist schlimmer geworden.

Auch wenn hier und da einiges getan wurde, aber einen entsprechenden Ausgleich gegen die Overpowered Killer gibt es nicht, als Survivor ist man noch weit mehr den Launen des Killers ausgesetzt. Das Spiel ist so extrem Pro-Killer das ist nicht mehr witzig, geschweige denn spaßig.
Ja, mit einem gut eingespielten Team ist es durchaus machbar, das bestreite ich nicht, aber man hat nicht immer sein Team parat und genau da ist der Knackpunkt.
Wenn man mit widlfremden Leuten die einen scheiß auf Teamwork geben zusammenspielen muss, bekommt man nur eins auf die Schnauze.
Freitag der 13 Das Spiel hat es besser gemacht, denn dort konnte man sich wenigstens wehren, wenn auch eher schlecht als recht.
Dead by Daylight kann Spaß machen wenn man; frustfrei ist, ein gutes eingespieltes Team hat und man einen ordentlichen Killer hat. Wenn nur eine Sache davon fehlt kann man das Game vergessen.
Ich empfehle daher dieses Game nicht, bis die Entwickler mal ihre beknackte Idee von einem "Pro-Killer-Game" ablegen.


EDIT:
Also nach einigen längerer Zeit des spielens macht es weiterhin Spaß, aber das Balancing das man gegen Imba-Killer antreten muss ist der letzt scheiß. Scheiße, so macht das doch echt keinen Spaß wenn man immer und immer gegen Killer mit Perks antreten muss die einen sofort töten können. Ohne Witz, kümmert euch dringend darum!
Fix this fucking game, instead of making this game unplayable. Well done develeports, middle finger from me

Ein sehr sehr gutes Spiel. Leider ist es fast unmöglich, mit Freunden "Online" zu spielen. Das Inviten in eine Gruppe für Online funktioniert nicht. Schade! So würde ich das Spiel nicht Empfehlen.

Dead By Daylight é um jogo ótimo, porém ainda tem muito a ser trabalhado. Não vejo muita diferença da versão BETA para o que estamos jogando agora. Às vezes isso atrapalha um pouco a diversão, mas não é algo que me de vontade de parar de jogar ou até mesmo ter me arrependido da compra.

O que mais me deixou desanimada foi o fato de não poder jogar ranqueada com os amigos ou até mesmo ser sobrevivente com eles.
Por exemplo: eu e meu amigo compramos e até agora só conseguimos jogar uma Private Match que foi 1vs1. Além de tudo, isso não vale nada. Vejo Dead By Daylight como um jogo que pra ser ainda mais divertido - até engraçado ou tenso - você precisa estar com seus amigos, um ajudando o outro e transmitindo a mesma tensão. É horrível quando o assassino te coloca no gancho, fica "guardando caixão" e alguém vem tentar te salvar mas acaba morrendo junto. Tipo... Falta de comunicação.

Tenho problemas pra entrar no lobby e só consigo jogar uma partida depois de 10 minutos tentando. Entra na sala, mas quando dou ready, volta pra tela do personagem. Isso é outro ponto que incomoda bastante.

Se você for comprar o jogo, esteja ciente de tudo que citei acima antes de xingar os desenvolvedores. Ainda existem muitos bugs e a maioria estraga uma partida completa. Acredito que quando tudo isso for arrumado, será um dos meus jogos favoritos. A adrenalina de conseguir fugir (principalmente quando é pelo buraco) é sensacional, realmente.

Currently would not recommend this game. It's a great idea for a game, and the few games I have played have been mostly fun. 

However, not being able to join with friends completely ruins the game. I am one of the people who spends ages trying to randomly join my mate in public servers. The need for inviting freinds online is emphasised by the way big youtubers praise the game from private games surrounded by their friends. If you have 4 other mates to play with privately then go ahead and get the game!

Don't really understand how this is the first proper release of the game, feels much more like a beta.

Altogether it could be a great game when playing with friends has been added. I will change my review when the friends situation is sorted!

EDIT: Survive with friends has recently been added and has vastly improved the game as a whole. Much funner shitting myself with a friend finally! servers can be an issue, constantly click join game until you find one. 

Recommend this game now as a result of playing with friends being added!

2nd EDIT: If you play with friends then this game is just waiting in a lobby, repatedly pressing ready to not get into any games.

3rd EDIT: Lobbies are now fixed and working very well. Also balance changes has made this game a lot more fun. I definietly recommend that people buy this game, all this problems have been fixed and is the incredible game i hoped it would be.

simply put the best £15 i have ever spent!

Recent patches balance the game ever so slightly more

Still an issue with certain killers not being able to stop gen rush,

But overall fun expierence only adivce to any new players close the chat as it CAN be toxic

It's a good game with a great concept behind it, but admittedly, this game runs so bad it's not even funny, not sure if I'm one of the only people with this problem but not even Killing Floor 2 in the Beta stage ran this bad on my computer, I run the lowest settings Dead by Daylight has and get 7 fps max in game, that is atrocious and needs to be looked into, maybe there's a tutorial on how to fix it, but there shouldn't have to be one, anyway, fun game, if you have a good pc and like games where you run around killing people or like to try and not be killed, I recommend it.

1) Not really the kind of game you want to play with friends
2) I've never watched any horror movie ever and I can honestly say that this game is not scary whatsoever
3) The atmosphere is too bright, kind of takes away from the eerieness
4) First game I played, the killer waited for me to open the gate to finally start swinging at me

Only two problems with the game. The loading screen leaves no indication to when the game is going to be starting. (There are 5 marks, have each one load relative to their players by representation?) 
The injured and struggling moans are awkward, repetitive, and annoying on their own. I understand they kinda need to stand out, and the ones that are there are ok, but in their sequence and with such few samples it starts to sound like someone defecating. 
The gameplay itself is 9/10, with the only problem being that it's obvious when a killer has a higher level than you when he can sniff out your location in a well hidden spot in under 20 seconds. Balance the match-making please.
作为恐怖游戏，能否让玩家感到恐怖才是关键。由于在游戏中生存者找不到什么良好的方法对抗杀人魔，因此在前期，逃生者最主要的是就是远离杀人魔，由于场景的幽暗和声效制作精良，因此在前期的紧张感还是非常不错的，但是真被发现了，由于地图设计方面缺少让逃生者摆脱杀人魔的地形会导致逃生者很快被抓，基本上杀人魔不是操作太差的话，生存者是很难逃脱的，因此，逃生时的紧张和刺激很快就会消失。
There are entire countries with less bugs than this mess of a game.

DBD is eine Tolle Idee gewesen im Jahr 2016, hat echt spaß gemacht es zu spielen trotz der mengen an bugs die bis heute im Jahr 2022 immer mehr geworden sind , da das Entwickler Studio Behavior mehr interesse hat über denn Shop geld zu verdienen anstatten ihr game zu balancen oder bugs zu fixen . Die Idee an dem Spiel is geil, hat aber leider ein falsches Entwicklerstudio was nur geld sieht . wenn man dann im Forum probleme anspricht wie Cheater , wird man dort perma gebannt und im mittleren SBMM bis höherem SBMM werden diese auch mehr . kommen wir zu dem Skill Based Matchmaking ( SBMM ) is voll fürn Arsch ( sty für die ausdrucksweise, aber es funktioniuert null, man pendelt nur zwischen high udn low SBMM man bekommt kein richtiges skill niveu. Kann abschließend nur sagen , wer in DBD spaß haben will, schnappt sich freunde udn spielt Kill ur Friends, da online jeder so hard am schwitzten is als wenns um das echte Leben geht und wenns mal net klappt, wird man sehr stark beleidigt, aber auch dazu gibt es seitens behavior keine bestrafung. Cheater werden nur mit stunden banns bestraft und das ingame repot system wird von denn Entwicklern nie beachtet, es existiert einfach

This game makes you truely feel like you are about to die well at least when you have headphones on and playing in the dark. Playing as the killer is amazing only thing I wish they would do is add a voice chat in game not only so you could scare the hunted players but so they could chat about what they have seen around the map. If they added voice chat this game would honestly be perfect for someone who loves to horror games. Some times of night it takes a while to join a game so the servers might be having trouble keeping up but the game has never crashed on me and some times like 1 out of 30 games I woulld say have been laggy some times not a problem but one time my character was moving the killer was like 20 feet away and then I jumped through a window and got downed when he had to have been like 15 feet away but besides the rare glitch or lag this game is perfect like really 9.5 outta 10 if they add voice chat without it like 9.0 outta 10! Hope this helps anyone deciding on buying this game the devs have been releasing patches which is nice to see that they want their game to do well!

Although it is an online only game, it is personally one of my favourites. It has a mixture of intensity, strategy and excitement.

You can either play as a hunter which hunts 4 survivors or be one of the 4 who are hunted.Your objective as a survivor is to escape through one of two main gates which must be powered by a certain amount of generators.You have to repair these generators without being cought. 

Oh, did I forget to mention that if you get cought by the hunter , you can be hung by him if you cant wiggle out of his grasp.Your team can either save you or continue with repairing the generators. If you happen to be last alive by deaths of your team or by them escaping , you can escape through a secret hatch if you manage to find it.

The game has a very good upgrade system with which you can unlock items to be used in games as well as perks.I am yet to find different clothing for characters which may come through an update later in the game.

This game does have a few bugs which do affect the game a little but the good qualities outweigh the bad. It is a very good game that has a very good price for its gameplay and i would recommend it for all casual gamers for a fun time with friends.
